verses.verse: וְשַׁ֣בְתִּֽי <S%H7725><s%> So I returned אֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and considered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עֲשֻׁקִ֔ים <S%H6217><s%> all the oppressions אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> that are done תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> and behold דִּמְעַ֣ת <S%H1832><s%> and behold the tears הָעֲשֻׁקִ֗ים <S%H6217><s%> of oppression וְאֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> had לָהֶם֙ מְנַחֵ֔ם <S%H5162><s%> and they had no comforter וּמִיַּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> and on the side עֹֽשְׁקֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6231><s%> of [such as were] oppressed כֹּ֔חַ <S%H3581><s%> [there was] power וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no לָהֶ֖ם מְנַחֵֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> but they had no comforter

וְשַׁבֵּ֧חַ <S%H7623><s%> Wherefore I praised אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֵּתִ֖ים <S%H4191><s%> the dead שֶׁכְּבָ֣ר <S%H3528><s%> which are already מֵ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> dead מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more הַ֣חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> more than the living אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> alive עֲדֶֽנָה׃ <S%H5728><s%> which are yet

וְטוֹב֙ <S%H2896><s%> Yea better מִשְּׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> [is he] than both אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who עֲדֶ֖ן <S%H5728><s%> they which hath not yet לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> has never הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> existed אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has never רָאָה֙ <S%H7200><s%> been who hath not seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> work הָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who נַעֲשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> that is done תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun

וְרָאִ֨יתִֽי <S%H7200><s%> Again I considered אֲנִ֜י <S%H589><s%> I אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עָמָ֗ל <S%H5999><s%> all travail וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every כִּשְׁר֣וֹן <S%H3788><s%> and every right הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H4639><s%> work כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he קִנְאַת־ <S%H7068><s%> is envied אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that for this a man מֵרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> of his neighbour גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> This [is] also vanity וּרְע֥וּת <S%H7469><s%> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit

הַכְּסִיל֙ <S%H3684><s%> The fool חֹבֵ֣ק <S%H2263><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֔יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands וְאֹכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> and eateth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1320><s%> his own flesh

ט֕וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Better מְלֹ֥א <S%H4393><s%> full כַ֖ף <S%H3709><s%> [is] an handful נָ֑חַת <S%H5183><s%> [with] quietness מִמְּלֹ֥א <S%H4393><s%> full חָפְנַ֛יִם <S%H2651><s%> than both the hands עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> [with] travail וּרְע֥וּת <S%H7469><s%> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit
וְשַׁ֧בְתִּי <S%H7725><s%> Then I returned אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I וָאֶרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and I saw הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> vanity תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is אֶחָד֩ <S%H259><s%> one וְאֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> without שֵׁנִ֜י <S%H8145><s%> [alone] and [there is] not a second גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> Indeed בֵּ֧ן <S%H1121><s%> yea he hath neither child וָאָ֣ח <S%H251><s%> nor brother אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> having ל֗וֹ וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> nor קֵץ֙ <S%H7093><s%> yet [is there] no end לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all עֲמָל֔וֹ <S%H5999><s%> of all his labour גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too [עֵינָיו כ] (עֵינֹ֖ו <S%H5869><s%> affliction ק) לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> were not תִשְׂבַּ֣ע <S%H7646><s%> satisfied עֹ֑שֶׁר <S%H6239><s%> with riches וּלְמִ֣י ׀ <S%H4310><s%> whom אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עָמֵ֗ל <S%H6001><s%> neither [saith he] For whom do I labour וּמְחַסֵּ֤ר <S%H2637><s%> and bereave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשִׁי֙ <S%H5315><s%> my soul מִטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> good גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> he הֶ֛בֶל <S%H1892><s%> is vanity וְעִנְיַ֥ן <S%H6045><s%> travail רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> yea it [is] a sore הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

טוֹבִ֥ים <S%H2896><s%> [are] better הַשְּׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> Two מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> than one אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> because יֵשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> because they have לָהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like שָׂכָ֥ר <S%H7939><s%> reward ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> a good בַּעֲמָלָֽם׃ <S%H5999><s%> for their labour

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> For if they fall הָאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> the one יָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> will lift up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲבֵר֑וֹ <S%H2270><s%> his fellow וְאִ֣יל֗וֹ <S%H337><s%> but woe הָֽאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> to him [that is] alone שֶׁיִּפּ֔וֹל <S%H5307><s%> when he falleth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there שֵׁנִ֖י <S%H8145><s%> for [he hath] not another לַהֲקִימֽוֹ׃ <S%H6965><s%> to help him up

גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> Again אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִשְׁכְּב֥וּ <S%H7901><s%> lie together שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> if two וְחַ֣ם <S%H2552><s%> then they have heat לָהֶ֑ם וּלְאֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> but how can one אֵ֥יךְ <S%H349><s%> how יֵחָֽם׃ <S%H3179><s%> be warm

וְאִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> and if יִתְקְפוֹ֙ <S%H8630><s%> prevail הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> And if one הַשְּׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> against him two יַעַמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> shall withstand נֶגְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5048><s%> him וְהַחוּט֙ <S%H2339><s%> cord הַֽמְשֻׁלָּ֔שׁ <S%H8027><s%> him and a threefold לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> is not בִמְהֵרָ֖ה <S%H4120><s%> is not quickly יִנָּתֵֽק׃ <S%H5423><s%> broken

ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Better יֶ֥לֶד <S%H3206><s%> child מִסְכֵּ֖ן <S%H4542><s%> [is] a poor וְחָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> and a wise מִמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king זָקֵן֙ <S%H2205><s%> than an old וּכְסִ֔יל <S%H3684><s%> and foolish אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> who will לְהִזָּהֵ֖ר <S%H2094><s%> no more be admonished עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> longer

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> though מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> court הָסוּרִ֖ים <S%H612><s%> band יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> he cometh לִמְלֹ֑ךְ <S%H4427><s%> to reign כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> though גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> even בְּמַלְכוּת֖וֹ <S%H4438><s%> in his kingdom נוֹלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> whereas also [he that is] born רָֽשׁ׃ <S%H7326><s%> becometh poor

רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> I considered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֣חַיִּ֔ים <S%H2416><s%> all the living הַֽמְהַלְּכִ֖ים <S%H1980><s%> which walk תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> under the sun עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> to the side הַיֶּ֣לֶד <S%H3206><s%> child הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> with the second אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> that shall stand up תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> under

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There קֵ֣ץ <S%H7093><s%> [There is] no end לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of all the people לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> [even] of all that have been before גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and even הָאַחֲרוֹנִ֖ים <S%H314><s%> them they also that come after לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <S%H8055><s%> shall not rejoice ב֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> too זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in him Surely this also [is] vanity וְרַעְי֥וֹן <S%H7475><s%> and vexation רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit
